function.function: Input height in centimeters and weight in kilograms
function.description: Provide fields for users to enter their height in centimeters and weight in kilograms.
Compute the Body Mass Index using the formula: BMI = weight (kg) / (height (m))^2.
Show the computed BMI value prominently on the page.
Provide a textual interpretation of the BMI value, categorizing it into Underweight, Normal weight, Overweight, or Obese.
Allow users to clear entered data and perform new calculations if desired.
Present a greeting and brief overview of the password generator's features.
Provide a button or link directing users to start generating passwords.
Allow users to input password criteria like length, inclusion of numbers/symbols, and case sensitivity.
Enable a button that when clicked, generates a password based on user-selected settings.
Provide an option to easily copy the generated password to the clipboard.
Allow users to toggle visibility of their generated password for security purposes.
Display a visual indicator, like progress bars, illustrating the strength of the generated passwords.
Offer a comprehensive list of frequently asked questions related to password generation.
Provide contact information or link for users needing further assistance or feedback.
Include a link to the website's privacy policy, ensuring transparency about data usage.
Provide access to the terms of service for users' reference and agreement.
Users should be able to input data for generating a QR code.
Provide users with examples of pre-generated QR codes for demonstration purposes.
Users need a field where they can enter the data to be encoded in the QR code.
Allow users to select from different encoding formats like URL, text, vCard, etc.
Give users options to adjust error correction level and version for customization.
Enable customization of design elements such as colors, logos in the center, or shapes.
Allow users to save their design settings for future use.
Provide a real-time preview of the QR code as users make changes.
Implement an error detection feature indicating if the current design or data input will result in a poor-quality scan.
Offer QR code downloads in various formats such as image files (PNG, JPEG) and vector graphics.
Facilitate direct sharing of the generated QR code to social media platforms or via email.
Provide a frequently asked questions (FAQ) section along with tips for generating effective QR codes.
Offer a channel to contact support should users run into issues or have questions not covered in the FAQ.

functions.description: Provide a navigation bar for quick access to 'Home', 'About Us', 'Features', and 'Contact'.
Display an engaging welcome message introducing the Markdown&HTML Converter tool.
Feature a section that briefly lists key features of the converter tool with icons or thumbnails.
Include an inviting CTA button for visitors to 'Try It Now' directly on the homepage.
Provide information about the company history, mission, and vision behind the converter tool.
Display a section featuring team members with photos, names, and short bios.
Enumerate all features of the converter including conversion accuracy, file format support, and user interface simplicity.
Provide a comparison chart between this tool and competitors outlining unique selling points.
Provide an area for users to paste or upload their Markdown content needing conversion.
Implement a prominent 'Convert' button that initiates the Markdown to HTML conversion process.
Allow an area where converted HTML output is displayed seamlessly and elegantly for download or copy action.
Offer users a chance to try out a free trial version before committing to a paid subscription, if applicable.
Provide a user-friendly sign-up form for new accounts or to start the trial period.
Display essential contact information including email address, phone number, and physical location if applicable.
Implement a live chat function for real-time support queries or feedback.

function.description: Display the list of existing todo items.
Provide a form to input and save new tasks with a short description, category, due date, and priority level.
Include a search bar to filter tasks by keywords or categories.
Show detailed information about a selected task including description, due date, priority, and status.
Allow users to modify the details of an existing task such as its description, due date, or category.
Provide a button to mark tasks as completed and move them to a 'Completed' list.
Option for users to permanently remove tasks from the list.
Display a bar chart showing the number of completed vs pending tasks over time.
Show a pie chart depicting tasks categorized by priority (e.g., High, Medium, Low).
Visualize the distribution of task due dates to identify peak workload periods.
Illustrate a breakdown of tasks by category to detect task variety and focus areas.
Allow users to see their profile details such as username, email, and account creation date.
Provide options for users to change their personal information (e.g., email or password).
Enable users to set preferences for receiving task reminders through notifications.
Let users manage account settings, including login credentials and privacy options.
Allow users to create a new account.
Enable users to access their personal accounts by entering credentials.
Display user profile information including name and account details.
Allow users to securely exit their session.
Show a summary of monthly and yearly income, with the ability to view detailed transactions.
Display summarized expenses over different periods and allow for details exploration.
Provide an interactive chart that shows balance changes over time, with zoom in/out features.
Enable users to enter new income or expense transactions, specifying date, amount, and category.
Allow users to update details of existing transactions if needed.
Provide the option to remove incorrect or outdated transactions from records.
Let users configure notifications for reaching specific balance thresholds.
Allow users to add, remove, or modify budget category labels for transactions.
Allows users to log in to their account using email and password.
Enables new users to create an account by providing necessary details like name, email, and password.
Provides a way for users to reset their forgotten passwords via email verification.
Allows users to access their personalized monthly calendar view from the dashboard.
Displays a brief summary of upcoming events and tasks for the current month on the dashboard.
Provides a visual overview of all the days in the selected month, highlighting events or tasks.
Enables users to add new events or tasks by selecting a date and providing details such as title, description, and time.
Allows users to modify existing events or tasks, including changing dates, times, or descriptions.
Gives the option to remove specific events or tasks from the calendar.
Provides functionality to filter displayed events based on categories like work, personal, etc.
Displays complete details of a selected event or task including date, time, category, and description.
Allows users to set reminders for events or tasks within the application through notifications or emails.
Enables users to view their profile details including name, email address, and settings.
Lets users edit their profile information like name or contact details from the profile page.
Provides an option for users to securely change their account password.
Allows users to select a theme color or layout preference for the application interface.
Provides options to set preferences for receiving notifications via email, push, or within the app.
Provides clear navigation links to different sections of the site including Product Info, Features, Pricing, and Contact Us.
Displays a captivating visual with a headline tagline that gives an overview of the AI Chatbot product.
Prominent buttons allowing users to 'Learn More' about the product, or 'Sign Up' for a trial/demo.
Detailed explanations of AI Chatbot's features with accompanying visuals such as icons or images to enhance understanding.
Allows users to compare the AI Chatbot features against competitors within a visual comparison chart.
Clear display of different pricing packages with bullet points highlighting key inclusions for each tier.
A tool that enables users to input data and calculate potential cost savings by using the AI Chatbot product.
Details company history, mission statement, leadership team, and what drives the business and technology.
Showcases customer testimonials and case studies to build trust and credibility for the AI Chatbot.
An accessible form allowing users to easily send inquiries directly through the website with predefined subject labels.
Provides real-time support via a live chat feature powered by another instance of the AI Chatbot for user assistance.
A comprehensive list of frequently asked questions that is searchable and categorized to help users find answers quickly.
An AI-driven feature that suggests the most relevant FAQ responses based on user input or queries.
Provides users with written articles, guides, and news specifically related to AI Chatbots to deepen product knowledge.
Allows users to submit their own stories or case studies about using the AI Chatbot for a chance to be featured on the site.
Detailed look at how different organizations have successfully implemented and benefited from the AI Chatbot with interactive elements or video content.
An engaging gallery that showcases user testimonials across various mediums including text, audio, and video formats.

functions.description: Display a welcoming message explaining the purpose of the calorie tracker.
Provide buttons to allow users to log in or sign up for an account.
Offer a link or section that provides a quick start guide or tutorial on how to use the application.
Show personal user information and settings.
Display current progress towards daily/weekly calorie goals.
Allow users to log meals and snacks including their calorie counts.
Provide a summary of macronutrients consumed throughout the day.
Enable text search functionality to find foods in the database.
Allow users to filter results by food categories (e.g., fruits, vegetables).
Facilitate scanning of barcodes from packaged foods to quickly retrieve nutritional information.
Visualize daily calorie intake and progress towards goals using charts or graphs.
Provide historical data analysis with charts to show weekly/monthly trends in calorie consumption.
Generate reports that break down nutrient intake by category (e.g., proteins, fats).
Allow users to modify personal details like age, weight, height, activity level.
Enable users to adjust their daily calorie intake goals based on changes in lifestyle or fitness objectives.
Provide a FAQ section answering common questions about app usage and features.
Offer users the ability to contact support for any queries or issues not covered in FAQs.
Provide a button that securely logs out the user from their account.

function.description: Verify that the welcome message on the home page is visible to users, ensuring it meets display requirements.
Check if the navigation button leading to the password generator page is present and functions as expected upon clicking.
Ensure the hyperlink to the about section on the home page is visible and navigable, leading users correctly to detailed information.
Confirm that the description text on the About page is displayed properly to provide essential details regarding the site’s purpose and functionality.

functions.description: Display a brief overview of the site's purpose and navigation aids to new users.
Allow employees and administrators to log in using their credentials
Redirect users to appropriate pages based on roles (employee or admin)
Provide a form for employees to submit claims under categories: Travel, Labor, Management, Equipment expenses
Show all claims submitted by the employee with their current status (Pending)
Display a list of all pending, approved, and rejected claims for processing
Enable admins to approve or reject submitted claims, updating their statuses accordingly
Provide tools for administrators to analyze balances and budget allocations across various expense categories
Allow generation of detailed financial reports on claims and expenses over set periods
Show detailed information about a specific claim when selected by either employee or admin
Terminate user session and redirect to the login page or home overview

function.description: Allow users to log in using their username and password.
Provide a way for users to reset their forgotten passwords via email.
Display summary statistics on customer relationships and sales.
Provide shortcuts to common tasks like viewing customers, products, and reports.
Enable the user to create a new customer record with fields such as name, birthday, age, sex, company, and phone number.
Allow editing of existing customer details.
Display a list of all customers with options to filter by name or company.
Create new product entries with fields like name, category, and recommended price.
Modify details of existing products.
Show a catalogue of all available products, with filter options by name or category.
Assign preferred products to each customer account based on their interests.
Update a customer's list of preferred products.
Input details for new sales transactions including datetime, product, customer, quantity, and amount.
Modify existing purchase records as necessary.
Display a log of all past purchases with filtering options by date, product name, or customer.
Enable the generation of sales reports based on time periods, products, and other criteria for managerial review.
Provide visual trends of sales data to identify growth patterns or areas needing attention.
Securely log out the current user from their session.

functions.description: The page should load quickly and efficiently when accessed via a web browser.
The 'helloword' page should display correctly on devices of various sizes, including desktops, tablets, and mobile phones.
The page must be compatible with all major web browsers like Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge to ensure consistent rendering and behavior.
Text on the 'helloword' page should be readable and accessible, including support for screen readers for visually impaired users.
If there is an issue causing the page not to load properly, a user-friendly error message or fallback text should be displayed.
Displays a single button labeled 'Go to HelloWorld' on the homepage.
The button should redirect visitors directly to the 'hello_world' page upon clicking.
Displays a welcome message or content labeled 'Hello, World!' on this page.

function.description: Open 'Spring Semester Subjects.xlsx' and read its content.
Identify and extract the header row with columns ['#', 'Name', 'Weekday', 'Time'].
Iterate through each data row, extracting values for '#', 'Name', 'Weekday', and 'Time'.
Create an empty two-dimensional array to store subjects.
Fill the array with subject data, organizing by 'Weekday' and 'Time'.
Check for any missing or anomalous values in the rows based on expected columns.
Ensure 'Time' falls within ['First period', 'Second period', 'Third period', 'Fourth period'].
Prepare a new Excel file to output the processed data.
Export the two-dimensional subject array into the new Excel file, organizing data by 'Weekday' and 'Time'.
Check the newly created Excel for correct formatting and data accuracy.
Ensure all file handles are closed properly after operation completion.
Read the 'Gamedata.xlsx' file to load data for further processing.
Verify that all necessary columns are present and contain no missing or invalid values.
Create a lagged version of the 'result' column, shifting it by one period to use in logistic modeling.
Determine which columns will serve as independent variables and ensure 'lagged result' is used as the dependent variable.
Fit a logistic regression model using the selected independent variables to predict the lagged 'result'.
Generate and display an overview of the logistic model's performance, including coefficients and statistical measures.
Export the summary of the logistic model into a new Excel file named 'Logistic.xlsx'.
Ensure that the output file is correctly formatted and contains all required data before completing the process.
Load the 'Deathlist.csv' dataset into a format that can be processed by the program.
Ensure the CSV file contains the required column named 'Date of death'.
Convert the dates listed under the 'Date of death' field from string to a date format suitable for analysis.
Aggregate deaths based on weekly intervals and count them respectively.
Prepare the data structure needed for creating a histogram, matching weeks to their corresponding death counts.
Use a plotting library or tool to display the weekly deaths as a bar graph (histogram).
Output the histogram for viewing in an appropriate manner, ensuring it is easily interpretable.
Provide options to save or export the histogram as a graphical file if required by users.
Detect and handle possible issues related to invalid data input, missing dataset or incorrect formats efficiently with informative feedback for the user.
Provide instructions or help documentation within the program on how to use it effectively and what each part of the output means.

functions.description: Showcase a list of the latest or most popular blog posts to engage visitors immediately.
Provide links to all main sections, including Home, Categories, Archive, About Us, and Contact.
Allow users to quickly search for specific blog posts or topics.
Display popular tags linking to relevant posts, helping users explore content by interest.
Communicate the purpose and values of the blog site clearly.
Provide information about individuals contributing to the blog with photographs if available.
Offer ways for visitors to reach out, including email and social media links.
Present the blog post title, author's name, publication date, and body content in an organized manner.
Showcase links to other posts that might interest visitors based on topic or author.
Allow readers to leave comments, fostering community interaction.
Show all available categories with the count of posts in each to help users navigate topics of interest.
Display a chronological list of posted articles within a selected category.
Provide sorting options based on year and month to help users locate past content easily.
Show all blog posts available within the selected time frame in reverse chronological order.
Provide a form for users to submit inquiries, comments, or feedback directly from the site.
Show a message confirming that their inquiry has been received and will be addressed.
